title: [BUG] Kimi k2.5 'Invalid request' errors on OpenRouter

logs.msg: OpenRouter returns 'Invalid request' for moonshotai/kimi-k2.5. Possibly tool calling issue - model listed as supporting tools but may not handle properly. Error: 'Invalid request: OpenAI: Provider returned error'

llm-connector ChatRequest lacks 'extra'/'provider' field for OpenRouter routing params. ProviderPrefs exist in ion but can't be sent to API. Known Kimi k2.5 tool calling bugs (GitHub gist). Options: 1) Disable tools for Kimi models, 2) Fork/PR llm-connector for extra_body support, 3) Use different model.
